a.title: FAQ Related to the State Mandated School Shutdown

div.a: FAQ Related to the State Mandated School Shutdown

p.span: This page will be updated to help support parents and students.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-size: 15px; line-height: 23px; font-family: Lato, sans-serif; overflow-wrap: break-word;

div.p: We want to thank you for your flexibility and patience as the situation related to the COVID-19 outbreak continues to evolve. The safety of our students and staff is our top priority.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-size: 15px; line-height: 23px; font-family: Lato, sans-serif; overflow-wrap: break-word;

div.p: Illinois Governor Pritzker has extended school closures in Illinois through April 30th. We will update this page as new information is released. We ask that parents, guardians, staff, and students to please watch for emails, social media, and website postings on updates.
